attributes.action: Honour the editorial staff of the Daily Telegraph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There can be no doubt that the British Public is indebted to members of the editorial staff of the Daily Telegraph for its exposure of the scandal in respect of expense claims by Members of Parliament. It is probably another historically rare case of so much being owed by so many to so few. 
In recognition of the frankness and bravery of the staff of the newspaper, we ask that some suitable awards be made in the Queen's Honours List as soon as possible.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
